## Technical Skills
* Programming languages: extensive experience with C, C++, Java, Visual Basic .NET, Python, Lua, and Scheme
* Practical experience with OpenCV, ITK, and VTK libraries.
* Experience using MATLAB and LabVIEW to control data acquisition equipment.
* Digital circuit design, including microcontroller and peripheral interfaces for embedded systems

## Experience
#### Computational perception research engineer at CWRU, February 2015 - present
* Worked on the leading edge of computer vision research to derive spatial information from images and video
* Focused on reconstruction of 3D information from motion cues in 2D video
* Programmed massively multithreaded jobs for a high performance computing cluster

#### Neurobiology lab equipment engineer and programmer at CWRU, 2013 - 2015
* Designed and constructed custom experimental data acquisition hardware
* Programmed advanced video analysis algorithms in MATLAB with a primary focus on accuracy

#### Audit and Testing Co-op at Keithley Instruments, Summer 2014
* Worked with existing testing software to validate builds of unreleased products
* Designed and built entirely new testing packages based on graph exploration algorithms
* Developed experience and familiarity with Python, Lua, and Visual Basic
* Focused on touchscreen GUI firmware

#### Machine shop apprentice and assistant at Bryn Mawr College, Summer 2013
* Developed metal fabrication skills and experience
* Designed and built a high-speed electric motorcycle, including a custom-built battery management system PCB and throttling hardware.
